text: The state seal of Arkansas was adopted in 1864. It was changed to its present style on May 23, 1907. The inner seal contains an Angel of Mercy, Sword of Justice and Goddess of Liberty around a bald eagle. The outer ring has the words "Great Seal of the State of Arkansas". Arkansas Category:Arkansas Category:1864 establishments in the United States Category:1860s establishments in Arkansas
title: Seal of Arkansas
